tool_description: The API allows you to get a link to download a public Twitter video in any available quality. Try it on the free plan
name: twitter_v3
title: twitter

api_list.name: hls
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter65.p.rapidapi.com/api/twitter/hls"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter65.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://twitter65.p.rapidapi.com/api/twitter/hls"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter65.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
